headline: Hot Love! Tabloids Embrace New Bezos
abstract: Just a year ago, the world’s richest man seemed to have a pretty low-key life. Times sure have changed.
lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — When Jeff Bezos and his former wife, MacKenzie, celebrated what would be their last anniversary together around Labor Day 2018, they arrived at a Miami nightclub with no fanfare. His table was booked online, which is “totally what tourists do” and “totally dorky,” the club’s celebrity liaison said in an interview at the time.
